title: Designing a Blended Teaching Methodology to Enhance the Effectiveness of Automotive Sales Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of the automotive industry and sales processes
context.additional_context: Analyzing and exploring improvement strategies for the effectiveness of automotive sales training conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain over 90% of the core stages in the automotive sales process.
Learners successfully perform hybrid sales simulations combining digital tools and traditional methods with over 80% accuracy.
Learners propose specific educational improvement plans using the CIP-R (Customer Interaction Process - Reflection) framework for evaluating sales training effectiveness with over 70% proficiency.
Learners apply learned content in real-world sales scenarios with over 85% accuracy through project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
